<style>
  .flex-caption {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  
  
  .sliderImage.option1 {
    height: 400px;
    width: 100%;
        background-position: 0 -200px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
  
  .flex-caption {
    position: relative;
    top: -400px;
    line-height: inherit;
    margin: 0 auto;
    z-index: 2;
    width: 100%;
}
  .flex-control-nav {
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    bottom: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
  .slider-content {
    margin-top: 175px;
    font-size: 18px;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 30px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .slider-content h2 {
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 26px;
    font-family: 'Open Sans', arial, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 800;
    text-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }
  .slider-content h1 {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', arial, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 800;
    text-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    text-transform: uppercase;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    font-size: 56px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  .slider-content h3 {
    font-family: 'Merriweather Sans', arial, sans-serif;
    font-style: italic;
    text-transform: lowercase;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 26px;
    text-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    margin-bottom: 45px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  .slider-content p {
    color: #fff;
  }
  .slider-buttons .btn {
    background: #df4a26;
    border: 1px solid #df4a26;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 0px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: normal !important;
    font-size: medium;
    padding: 15px 50px;
  }
  .slider-buttons .btn:hover, .slider-buttons .btn:focus {
    background: transparent;
    border: 1px solid #df4a26;
    color: #df4a26;
  }

  li.homepage-slide {
    height: 400px;
    -webkit-background-size: cover!important;
  }


  @media (max-width: 767px) {
    .slider-content h1 {
      font-size: 35px;
    }
    .slider-content {
      margin-top: 95px;
    }
    li.homepage-slide{
      height: 550px;
    }
  }

  @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 991px) {
    .slider-content {
      margin-top: 140px;
    }
  }


</style>
